name: Elemental Mayhem
description:
Game made for Score Space Game Jam #12 with theme COMBINING.

Link to GameJam page: https://gamejam.com/game/elemental-mayhem

When order and chaos awaken, only the stronger elements will prevail. Combine with different elements, change your playstyle and survive the elemental mayhem! 

You have until the music ends to collect the most souls you can, and try to stay at the top of the leaderboard. You gain souls when you kill the other elemental creatures, but if you absorb them you gain their power!

Instructions: 

-  Move with WASD 

-  Attack with left mouse button 

-  Absorb and combine with enemies with right mouse button.

-  Absorbing doesn't give souls If you get hit you lose souls 

Original Music, SFX from www.zapsplat.com, Leaderboards implemented with http://dreamlo.com/
